Title: Firmly grasp large-scale revolutionary criticism
Designer: Propaganda Group of the Revolutionary Committee of the Shanghai No. 3 Ink Factory
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Factory workers shout phrases from the Little Red Book to a stage where 'rightist' managers are forced to stand, sometimes for hours, to be accused, insulted and beaten.
Theme: Cultural Revolution Campaigns (1966-1976)Quotations from Chairman Mao
